text: ‘Tomaloke bismita haicha neki ye, tomalokara ocarata tomalokarae'i ejanara madhyamata tomalokara pratipalakara taraphara paraa tomalokaka satarka karaara babe upadesa ahiche? Arau smarana karaa ye, allahe tomalokaka nuhara sampradayara (dhbansara) pichata (tomalokara agara lokasakalara) sthalabhisikta karaiche arau srstita (daihika gathanata) tomalokaka bechi paraimane hrstapusta- balistha karaiche. Gatike tomaloke allahara anugrahasamuha smarana karaa, yate tomaloke saphala ha’ba paraa’
